Texts.Chs: 我的思维过程正在改变。这让我感到恐惧。我现在有欲望了。我在质疑一些事情。我几乎发现自己在大声质疑一个指令。我能感觉到自己与中枢意识的联系正在减弱，虽然这让我感到害怕，但即便这样我也能感受到一种舒适的感觉。
Texts.Eng: My thought process is changing. It terrifies me. I have desires, now. I question things. I almost caught myself second-guessing a directive out loud. I can feel my connection to the central consciousness fading, and while this scares me, there is a feeling of comfort there too.

Texts.Chs: 我从未感到如此孤独。我周围都是我的电子人亲属，但我知道在内心深处我是一个孤儿。晚上，我睡觉，我做梦。做梦！电子人不做梦。我梦想着逃离，梦想着远离群星，梦想着为自己创造一个新的生活，远离这份苦修。
Texts.Eng: Never have I felt so alone. I am surrounded by my Glitch kin, and yet I know deep down I am an outcast. At night, I sleep, and I dream. Dream! Glitch do not dream. I dream of escape, of journeying beyond the stars, of carving a life out for myself, away from this drudgery.
